item.title: Report X-2023081832
item.description:
Report X-2023081832

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was picked up on 8/21 in our area. It was found the next morning as having been damaged. Somehow, it was damaged between the pickup time on Monday and Tuesday morning when it was noted as damaged. The package had a corrosive label and the SDS revealed it to be a Haz Mat. However, the shipper didn't ship it as a Haz Mat - no Certification or OP900. It was brought to QA and then the Haz Cage once it was discovered. DescribePack: The cap came off 1 bottle spilling the entire contents on the interior of the box. None of the other bottles are salvageable. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was brought to QA and then held for the Haz Mat specialist.

item.title: Report X-2023081830
item.description:
Report X-2023081830

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-22T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: STRATFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being unloaded from the trailer , when the bottom of the outer packaging gave out causing one of the inner containers to crack and the liquid contents to be released. DescribePack: crack at the bottom of the container DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was put into a hazmat bin

item.title: Report X-2023081616
item.description:
Report X-2023081616

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Tape failed on the bottom closures prompting the pkg to be sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. Upon inspection of the carton interior it was discovered a small amount of liquid had leaked wetting only the inside of the carton and dried droplets were found on the inner containers. The pkg and contents were placed in a lined Hazmat bin when the failure of the closures was found and the pkg remains in the bin at this time. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.
